item.description:
Hey Everyone,

On Thursday nights the Burren in Somerville has a band called ScatterShot that plays 80's tunes. So let's meet there and listen/dance to some good music in one of Boston's best Irish pubs.

I think the band starts around 10, so let's get there at 9pm. We'll meet in the backroom of the Burren. I'll send my cell number to those who RSVP.

The Burren is in Davis Square. Parking is limited so it' best to use public transportation (Red Line).

Hope to see you there,
Paul
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the backroom and I'll also send out my cell number to all attendees.
item.name: 80's night at the Burren
